EmailTemplate.name: ATR - Test Drive MyAerospace.ATR - Test Drive Honeywell 2.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Experience the all new Honeywell Aerospace Portal 2.0
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace> Test Drive the New Honeywell Portal 2.0 Three Easy Ways to Experience A Higher Level of Support
Every Honeywell customer support order should be fast, simple and reliable. As promised, we’ve overhauled our system and created a new and improved, Honeywell portal. We want you to experience it for yourself.
It’s time take a test drive.
1 Pre-Scheduled Webinar
Choose from among 20 upcoming dates to join a webinar that fits your schedule. View Schedule <http://pages3.honeywell.com/2013Webinars_MyAerospace-Orders.html?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRokvaXMZKXonjHpfsX54ukqWK%2BylMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4DRMprI%2BSLDwEYGJlv6SgFTLTEMbFpwrgEWhM%3D>.
2 Custom-Scheduled Webinar
Gather a handful of co-workers interested in a quick introduction, and we’ll schedule a session just for your group. Email for More Information <mailto:grant.humpherys@honeywell.com?subject=Customer%20Request:%20Private%20MyAerospace.com%20Order%20Status%20Training%20Session>.
3 On-Demand Video
Watch a short training session whenever your schedule allows. Stop, start and continue at your convenience. Watch Here <http://ez.com/OrderStatus2013Sept>.
Honeywell is listening — and taking action. We want you to continue to tell us how to improve. By taking advantage of this training, we believe you’ll be better equipped to navigate the new system and let us know how it’s working for you. Privacy Statement <http://honeywell.com/Privacy> Terms & Conditions <http://honeywell.com/Pages/TermsConditions.aspx> © 2013 Honeywell International Inc. <http://www.honeywell.com>
